short_summary: Department of National Defence Headquarters is looking to procure commercial buses for use in Canada.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure quantity of eight (8) Commercial Bus for delivery to various CFB, Canada. An option for six (6) Commercial Bus is included for delivery within Canada. The requested delivery date is 270 days after receipt of order (ARO).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Commercial Bus RFP

**Reference Number**: cb-267-85515188

**Solicitation Number**: W8476-246846/B

**Publication Date**: November 22, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: January 15, 2025, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Brief Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of a quantity of eight (8) commercial buses for delivery to various Canadian Forces Base (CFB) locations in Canada. An optional six (6) buses are also available for delivery within Canada, with a requested delivery date of 270 days after receipt of order.

The procurement is subject to the Canadian Content Policy. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.

## Unspsc Codes

* 25100000: Motor vehicles
* 25101500: Passenger motor vehicles
* 25101501: Minibuses
* 25101502: Buses

## Tender Requirements

* Tender submissions must be in English or French
* Tender format: ASCII text files only
* Tender size: 1000 pages maximum
* Tender submission method: Email only to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca)

## Evaluation and Selection Criteria

* Price: The lowest price will be used as the selection criterion.

## Contact and Support Information

* Primary Contact: Dong Le (dong.le@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (999) 999-9999
* Note: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Attachments

* RFP document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52371/bt420_w8476-246846-b_rfp-original.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52371/bt420_w8476-246846-b_rfp-original.pdf)

I rewrote the original text into a more concise and professional format. I included the most important information and excluded unnecessary details. I also ensured that it was free from grammatical errors and had proper formatting. Let me know if you'd like me to make any
